title: How to Share Personal or Public Files Using uTorrent

steps.headline: Send a single file by clicking on "Add File" or send a folder by clicking on "Add Directory".
Browse through your computer and select the appropriate file.
Avoid deleting the file/folder or changing the location of it on your hard drive if you wish to share it.

steps.headline: Skip the "Torrent Properties" option if you want to share the file with only a few people, such as close friends.
Check the "Private Torrent" and "Start Seeding" options.

You should see the icon of the file in uTorrent now. A new file of KBs will be created. steps.headline: Send this file to your friend(s) through e-mail.
steps.description: Your friend should also have uTorrent on their computer.

steps.headline: Tell them to double click on the torrent and start downloading it through the program.
